Package gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.jdbc

This package contains implementations based on JDBC for the sub-interfaces of Worker that are defined in the package gr.interamerican.bo2.arch.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
JdbcConnectionProvider Database connection provider.
 

Class Summary
AbstractJdbcWorker Abstract base class for worker implementations based on JDBC.
ConnectionStrategy Strategy object used for JDBC.
DriverConnectionStrategy Implementation of JdbcConnectionProvider that will load a database driver and create a connection.
JdbcCommand Abstract implementation of DataCommand based on JDBC.
JdbcConnectionProviderImpl Implementation of JdbcConnectionProvider that will load a database driver and create a connection.
JdbcConnectionsTransactionManager This is an inadequate implementation of TransactionManager based on an SQL Connection.
JdbcCustomAnswerSingleStatementQuestion<A> Question implementation used in cases where: Only one SQL statement is required.
JdbcDetachStrategy This implementation of DetachStrategy does not do anything.
JdbcExistsQuestion This is a question based on one and only one SQL statement that checks if something exists in the database.
JdbcPersistenceWorker<PO extends PersistentObject<?>> Abstract implementation of PersistenceWorker based on JDBC.
JdbcQuery Abstract implementation of Query based on JDBC.
JdbcQuestion<A> JDBC based implementation of Question
JdbcSimpleCommand Abstract implementation of DataCommand based on JDBC.
JdbcSimpleQuestion<A> This is a question based on one and only one SQL statement.
JdbcSingleStatementCommand This is a command based on one and only one SQL statement.
JdbcSingleStatementQuestion<A> This is a question based on one and only one SQL statement.
JdbcStaticCommand JdbcStaticCommand is a JdbcCommand that has only one SQL statement and has no parameters.
JdbcStaticQuery JdbcStaticQuery is a concrete sub-class of JdbcQuery.
JdbcUtils  
StatementLocator Locates SQL statements marked with an annotation.
ThreadLocalConnectionStrategy Implementation of JdbcConnectionProvider that expects to get an open database connection from the current thread.
 

Annotation Types Summary
Sql The purpose of this annotation is to mark the single field that is used as an SQL statement in a class.
 

Package gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.jdbc Description

This package contains implementations based on JDBC for the sub-interfaces of Worker that are defined in the package gr.interamerican.bo2.arch.
